attributes.action: remove all speed bumps in the UK as they create high maintaining costs for our vehicles that are not even speeding which is highly unfair and penalises  safe drivers for no good cause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Priminister, 

I am creating this petition in a some-what upset mood as you and your road inferstructure department have costs me another £130.

I do not drive at excess speed, and to the best of my knowledge I drive legaly at all times... your government have added more speed bumps to the UK roads than is required! I for one take these speed bumps at the correct and legal speed yet you have incured me over £130 YET AGAIN!

Remove them and find something better, and that does not include a camera as they are proven to by inaccurate on countless occasions and people have no defence against their inaccuracies!

Do you also realise that Police forces are now training civilians to use speed cameras? yes that's is correct, (elderly people with time on their hands is how one advert was worded) can now speed trap you, they are not legal law-enforcing specialists, they are merely people who have no expert analysis in the field, people who fancy themselves as the LAW!

It is an ever growing concern - we respect that people speed but you must find something better than this as you are costing us a fortune unfairly in my own case and thousands of others

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
